item.tinkers_thinking.ashes.tooltip: Dropped from blaze killed by water or snow

block.tinkers_thinking.soul_vine.tooltip: Dropped from creepers that were killed by Sonic Boom and had the sculk power effect
block.tinkers_thinking.bound_chain.toolt: Dropped from iron golems that were killed by Sonic Boom and had the sculk power effect
item.tinkers_thinking.paxel.description:
Paxel is a versatile mining tool. It is suitable to even almost all kinds of blocks,but does more rocks and logs.
 The villagers must dislike this.
item.tinkers_thinking.knife.description:
Knife is a kind of cheap lightweight weapon, is also applicable to cutting ingredients.
 May need to consult a farmer.
item.tinkers_thinking.mace.description:
Mace is a melee weapon that deals more damage the farther a player falls before hitting an entity with it, with successful hits completely negating the user's fall damage.
 Look up!
item.tinkers_thinking.arrow_thrower.desc: Arrow Thrower is a tool that can throw arrow, it allows doing ranged damage in melee.
item.tinkers_thinking.repeating_crossbow:
The Repeating Crossbow is a long-range tool with high burst damage. It can be loaded with up to 3 arrows at a time and then fire them continuously.
 It cannot be reloaded until all the loaded arrows have been fired.
 Ratatatata~
material.tinkers_thinking.paper.flavor: Cutted by paper is really painful
material.tinkers_thinking.paper.encyclop: Grants two additional upgrade slots, but durability reduce by 25% per level, also can be repair by paper
material.tinkers_thinking.prismarine.enc: Tool mines faster underwater or in the rain!
material.tinkers_thinking.sponge.flavor: Not suitable for use at high temperature
material.tinkers_thinking.sponge.encyclo: Make target cannot melee for 8 seconds,target will be immune to modifier in 18 seconds, immune time will reduce in a higher level.If the target takes damage, the disarm effect will end early
material.tinkers_thinking.netherrack.enc: Melee Damage boost 2 per level to the mobs cannot immune to fire
material.tinkers_thinking.tinkers_bronze: Not to be confused with Obsidian Bronze
+5 mining speed  per lever when breaking some of blocks that can be cut in the stonecutter, such as stone
Arrows have 85% velocity, but do 130% projectile power
+8% protection per level against damages that bypasses armor
material.tinkers_thinking.ardite.encyclo: -0.417% durability damage pre block per level below 72, the maximum is 80%
material.tinkers_thinking.stewium.encycl: Having 15% chance repairing 1 durability while having 33 % chance to reduce 1 overslime per second, also can be repair by gelatinous slime drop
material.tinkers_thinking.dusk.encyclope: +2 melee damage per level when against slimes, and poison them
material.tinkers_thinking.dusk.armor: Reflect damage to attacker, attacker will be immune to modifier in 3 seconds
material.tinkers_thinking.lightite.encyc: -10% gravity,While there is not other item in the main hand hotbar, +30% melee speed per level
material.tinkers_thinking.lightite.range: -10% gravity,While there is not other item in the main hand hotbar, +30% draw speed per level
material.tinkers_thinking.lightite.armor: -10% gravity,Every empty slot in the main hand hotbar make you +2.5% moving speed per level
material.tinkers_thinking.black_chocolat: After attacking a target, there has a 25% chance to get Strength III for 6 seconds, damage 5 durability
material.tinkers_thinking.white_chocolat: After mining a block, there has a 25% chance to get Haste III for 6 seconds, damage 5 durability
material.tinkers_thinking.chlorophyte.en: After melee attack, have 15% chance per level  to heal 30% lost health and damage 8 durability
material.tinkers_thinking.chlorophyte.ra: After launch arrow, have 15% chance per level to heal 30% lost health and damage 8 durability
material.tinkers_thinking.chlorophyte.ar: After being taken damage, have 15% chance per level to heal 20% lost health and damage 8 durability
material.tinkers_thinking.spectre.flavor: Of Course, Ghasts are made from cats
material.tinkers_thinking.spectre.encycl: Attack give target Invisibility for 10 seconds, increases the melee damage and projectile damage of 20% to target that has Invisibility per level
material.tinkers_thinking.spectre.armor: After being taken damage, give self Invisibility for 10 seconds, grants protection of 4% while has Invisibility per level
material.tinkers_thinking.shroomite.ency: While the sky light reduce 1 level, increases the mining speed and velocity of 1.5%
material.tinkers_thinking.shroomite.armo: While the sky light reduce 3 level, reduces 0.2 damage per level
material.tinkers_thinking.obsidian_bronz: Not to be confused with Echo Bronze
In the first level, has 30% chance to reduce 1 durability damage,while has 5% chance to add 1 durability damage
material.tinkers_thinking.electrical_ste: Is it really okay to just make mistakes mistakes?
After melee hit,makes livings nearby go flying further, having no effect on other players
After projectile hit,makes livings nearby go flying further, having no effect on other players
After being taken damage,makes livings nearby go flying further, having no effect on other players
material.tinkers_thinking.echo_bronze.fl: Not to be confused with Tinkers' Bronze
material.tinkers_thinking.echo_bronze.en: When having the sculk power effect, boost mining speed and draw speed of 20%
material.tinkers_thinking.echo_bronze.ar: When having the sculk power effect, boost other protection of 20%
material.tinkers_thinking.verdant_frogcr: -5% gravity,When having the sculk power effect,make target keep levitating for 6 seconds, target will be immune to modifier in 18 seconds,immune time will reduce in a higher level
material.tinkers_thinking.ochre_frogcroa: +5% gravity,When having the sculk power effect,make target cannot jump and fly for 6 seconds, target will be immune to modifier in 18 seconds,immune time will reduce in a higher level
material.tinkers_thinking.pearlescent_fr: When having the sculk power effect, make target teleport randomly
material.tinkers_thinking.stabilized_gun: Didn't eat? Why isn't it exploding?

15% chance per level to make the target gain 30 seconds of cataclysm effect. During cataclysm effect, taking fire damage will cause an explosion. Both fire and freezing damage will remove cataclysm effect
material.tinkers_thinking.metherite.ency: Reduces melee damage by 20% per level, and converts 75% of it into magic damage
material.tinkers_thinking.metherite.armo: Reduces damage taken by 20% per level, and converts 75% of it into magic damage
material.tinkers_thinking.tempered_glass: (50% × square root of level × square of percentage of lost durability) probability of not consuming durability
material.tinkers_thinking.chillslime_cry: Snowflakes are fluttering~ The wind is howling~

After taking damage, additionally consume up to 5 slime coatings, causing the attacker to receive the freezing cold effect for twice the duration. During the freezing cold effect, the target's movement speed continuously decreases, and additional damage is dealt when the effect ends (doubled when in water)

After taken damage, additionally consume up to 5 slime coatings, causing the attacker to receive the freezing cold effect for twice the duration. During the freezing cold effect, the target's movement speed continuously decreases, and additional damage is dealt when the effect ends (doubled when in water)
material.tinkers_thinking.scarlet_slimes: Upon hitting a target, at level 1, consume up to 5 overslime coating and apply a disintegration I effect with the same duration. Each level doubles the duration. When own health is below 50%, it changes to disintegration II; below 20%, changes to disintegration IV
material.tinkers_thinking.ancient_cerami: The 'soul' of tools originates from ancient earth and civilizations

When having Sculk Energy effect, each level generates 1 Soul Shard A after attacking. Each shard picked up restores 2 health and grants 3 seconds of Resistance III (non-stacking). Targets are immune to this trait for 10 seconds

When having Sculk Energy effect, each level generates 1 Soul Shard B after being attacked. Each shard picked up restores 2 health and grants 3 seconds of Haste III (non-stacking). Targets are immune to this trait for 10 seconds
material.tinkers_thinking.solidified_emp: Don't even think about staying out of this

§cOdd: Each level applies one of poison, wither, bleeding, or disintegration to the target for 4 seconds,or extends duration if already present/§9Even: For each of the above effects on the target, damage increases by 10%
material.tinkers_thinking.copshowium.enc: §cSummons lightning bolt after attack, damage equals three times the trait level/§9Even: Creates an area effect cloud of instant damage after attack, effect level equals trait level
material.tinkers_thinking.copshowium.arm: Takes effect after 11 seconds at level 1, each subsequent level reduces duration by 1 second/§cOdd: After taking damage, teleport to the position where damage was received after a certain time/§9Even: After taking damage, adjust health to match the state after taking damage after a certain time
material.tinkers_thinking.beetron.encycl: While Hunger Value reduce 1, increases the mining speed of 2%
material.tinkers_thinking.beetron.ranged: While Hunger Value reduce 1, increases the velocity of 2%
material.tinkers_thinking.burnt_ashes.fl: While embers still glow, life stirs unseen
material.tinkers_thinking.burnt_ashes.en: When an attack hits a burning target, it deals additional damage based on the remaining burning time, and then extinguishes the flames on the target.
material.tinkers_thinking.burnt_ashes.ar: When taking non - fire damage while on fire, the target restores health points according to its remaining burning time, and then the flames on it are extinguished.
material.tinkers_thinking.soul_vine.flav: Just as vines keep stretching onward
material.tinkers_thinking.soul_vine.ency: When having the sculk power effect, the max health is temporarily increased based on 50% damage value after taking damage.It lasts until the sculk power ends
material.tinkers_thinking.bound_chain.fl: Chains, of course, are for bounding
material.tinkers_thinking.bound_chain.en: When having the sculk power effect, killing a target instantly resets the attack cooldown, and then +25% damage of the next attack
material.tinkers_thinking.warden_steel.e: When having the sculk power effect, Hitting an attack extends the Last Effort effect by 4 seconds. During this effect, you will not die, but will die immediately after the effect ends
material.tinkers_thinking.warden_steel.a: When having the sculk power effect, taking fatal damage grants the Last Effort effect. During this effect, you will not die, but will die immediately after the effect ends.At level 1, it lasts for 12 seconds, and each subsequent level adds 3 seconds
material.tinkers_thinking.bacium.flavor: The bane of wild pig brutes
material.tinkers_thinking.bacium.encyclo: Deals +5 damage and applies the Weakness III to all types of pigs
material.tinkers_thinking.bacium.armor: When the base damage value is greater than health - 1, this damage is prevented, followed by a cooldown for 12 seconds
modifier.tinkers_thinking.soft.descripti: Durability reduce,also can be repair by paper
modifier.tinkers_thinking.prickly.descri: Do some another melee damage in random
modifier.tinkers_thinking.hellish.descri: Damage boost to the mobs cannot immune to fire
modifier.tinkers_thinking.repayed.descri: Repay one of this tool's upgrade slots!
modifier.tinkers_thinking.withernic.desc: The head of the ancient undead allows your tool a second ability slot!
modifier.tinkers_thinking.deposition.des: The lower height is, the less the durability is damage
modifier.tinkers_thinking.cutting.descri: Tool breaks some of blocks that can be cut in the stonecutter, such as stone,faster
modifier.tinkers_thinking.impact.flavor: The strength will come out in the end
modifier.tinkers_thinking.impact.descrip: Arrows fly slower, but do the more projectile damage
modifier.tinkers_thinking.falling_attack: Deals more damage the farther a player falls
modifier.tinkers_thinking.overeat.descri: Tool can eat overslime and gelatinous slime drop to repair itself
modifier.tinkers_thinking.overdose.descr: Tool does bonus melee damage against slimes, and poison them
modifier.tinkers_thinking.disarm.descrip: Make target cannot melee for a while, target will be immune to modifier in a few seconds.If the target takes damage, the disarm effect will end early
modifier.tinkers_thinking.stimulation.de: After attacking a target, there has a chance to get Strength by chance,and damage some durability
modifier.tinkers_thinking.inspired.descr: After mining a block, there has a chance to get Haste by chance,and damage some durability
modifier.tinkers_thinking.symbiotic.desc: After tool melee hitting ,tool launching arrow or armor being hit, reduce durability and heal you randomly
modifier.tinkers_thinking.mock.descripti: Attack give target Invisibility, increases the melee damage and projectile damage to target that has Invisibility
modifier.tinkers_thinking.concealing.des: After taking damage, give yourself Invisibility, and grants protection while you have Invisibility
modifier.tinkers_thinking.shady.descript: The daker sky light in here is, the faster mining speed and velocity is
modifier.tinkers_thinking.shadowing.desc: The daker sky light in here is, the less attack damage you are taken
modifier.tinkers_thinking.duritae.flavor: Doesn't taste as good as it sounds.
modifier.tinkers_thinking.duritae.descri: Your tool lasts longer...most of the time.
modifier.tinkers_thinking.repulsive.desc: After tool hitting or armor being hit, makes other livings nearby go flying further, having no effect on other players
modifier.tinkers_thinking.sculk_catalyse: Transform Experience value into sculk power; When having the sculk power effect, -1 damage which tool takes from normal usage
modifier.tinkers_thinking.sculk_boost.fl: A good grounding ensures success in what one does
modifier.tinkers_thinking.sculk_boost.de: When having the sculk power effect, boost mining speed and draw speed
modifier.tinkers_thinking.sculk_boost.ar: When having the sculk power effect, boost other protection
modifier.tinkers_thinking.sculk_levitate: Riding the wind and rising up
When having the sculk power effect, make target keep levitating for a while, target will be immune to modifier in a few seconds
When having the sculk power effect, make target cannot jump and fly, target will be immune to modifier in a few seconds
modifier.tinkers_thinking.sculk_teleport: When having the sculk power effect, make target teleport randomly
modifier.tinkers_thinking.backstabbing.f: Make use of the precarious situation...
modifier.tinkers_thinking.backstabbing.d: Amplifies damage when striking a target from behind
modifier.tinkers_thinking.broad.flavor: Tell a story without missing a single circumstance!
modifier.tinkers_thinking.broad.descript: Boost block angle, cannot above maximum (180°).
modifier.tinkers_thinking.sprinting.desc: Sprinting fast in horizontal direction, with no gravity temporarily
modifier.tinkers_thinking.countermeasure: Grants protection against damage all protectable damage
modifier.tinkers_thinking.spiky.descript: Reflect damage to attacker, attacker will be immune to modifier in a few seconds
modifier.tinkers_thinking.hungriness.des: The lower Hunger Value is, faster mining speed and velocity is
modifier.tinkers_thinking.burning_out.de: When an attack hits a burning target, it deals additional damage based on the remaining burning time, and then extinguishes the flames on the target.
modifier.tinkers_thinking.reburning.flav: Only when the flame dies, it rests
modifier.tinkers_thinking.reburning.desc: When taking non-fire damage while on fire, the target heals health according to its remaining burning time, and then the flames on it are extinguished.
modifier.tinkers_thinking.lightly_attack: Go into battle with a light pack
While there is not other item in the main hand hotbar,boost melee speed
While there is not other item in the main hand hotbar,boost draw speed
modifier.tinkers_thinking.sculk_breed.de: When having the sculk power effect, the max health is temporarily increased based on the damage value after taking damage
modifier.tinkers_thinking.sculk_dash.des: When having the sculk power effect, killing a target instantly resets the attack cooldown, and then the damage of the next attack is increased
modifier.tinkers_thinking.sculk_struggle: Are you willing to accept this? Anyway, I'm not
When having the sculk power effect, taking fatal damage grants the Last Effort effect. During this effect, you will not die, but will die immediately after the effect ends
modifier.tinkers_thinking.bane_of_pigs.d: Deals extra damage and applies the Weakness effect to all types of pigs
modifier.tinkers_thinking.antibrute.desc: When the base damage value is greater than health - 1, this damage is prevented, followed by a cooldown for a period of time
modifier.tinkers_thinking.repeating_adva: Increases the number of arrows loaded at once for the repeating crossbow, but reduces reload speed by 15%
modifier.tinkers_thinking.sinistral.flav: It sounds evil, but I assure you its a perfectly natural condition
modifier.tinkers_thinking.sinistral.desc: When in main hand, Repeating crossbow fires when attacking instead of interacting and will not load while sneaking.
Boost using item speed and reduce gravity
modifier.tinkers_thinking.hurried.descri: Every empty slot in the main hand hotbar make you boost moving speed
modifier.tinkers_thinking.crimson.descri: Temporarily increases armor value after attacking a target
modifier.tinkers_thinking.cataclysm.flav: Blow you up and you'll get mad again
modifier.tinkers_thinking.cataclysm.desc: Attacks have a chance to make the target gain the cataclysm effect
modifier.tinkers_thinking.magic_transfor: Converts part of the inflicted or taken damage into magic damage
modifier.tinkers_thinking.durable.flavor: The less durability, the more durability
modifier.tinkers_thinking.durable.descri: The lower the durability, the lower the probability of durability consumption
modifier.tinkers_thinking.overfreeze.des: After attacking or being attacked, the opponent's movement speed continuously decreases and takes additional damage after a period of time (doubled when in water)
modifier.tinkers_thinking.tyranny.descri: If the normal melee damage of the main-hand Tinkers' tool is greater than the villager's maximum health, the transaction price decreases by 35%
modifier.tinkers_thinking.overdisintegra: Consumes slime coating upon hitting a target to apply Collapse effect. The lower the user's health, the stronger the Collapse level
modifier.tinkers_thinking.sculk_siphon.d: When having Sculk Energy effect, attacking or being attacked generates soul shards. Picking up shards restores health and grants buffs. Targets are immune to this trait for a period of time
modifier.tinkers_thinking.reverse.descri: Effects of Reverse series traits are affected by the parity of tool usage count.§cDurability consumption doubled/§9Even: No durability consumption
modifier.tinkers_thinking.recalamity.fla: Survive a catastrophe, only to get finished off
modifier.tinkers_thinking.recalamity.des: §cOdd: Applies one of Poison, Wither, Bleeding, or Disintegration to the target; extends duration if already present/§9Even: Increases damage based on the number of the above effects on the target
Do you know what comes next?
Reduces gravity. §cOdd: Summons lightning bolt after attack/§9Even: Creates area effect cloud of instant damage after attack
modifier.tinkers_thinking.retransit.flav: Some things still need to happen again...
modifier.tinkers_thinking.retransit.desc: Reduces gravity. §cOdd: After taking damage, teleport to the position where damage was received after a certain time/§9Even: After taking damage, adjust health to match the state after taking damage after a certain time
death.attack.tinkers_thinking.last_effor: %1$s fought with all one's might but couldn't overcome
%1$s fought with all one's might but couldn't overcome %2$s
recipe.tinkers_thinking.modifier.backsta: Backstabbing II requires a different recipe for the first level
Backstabbing III requires a different recipe for the first level
